summary: A new pastor arrives in a stark Vermont village and is intrigued by crippled, misshapen Ethan Frome living on an isolated, hardscrabble farm with his sickly wife Zeena.
cast: Liam Neeson|Gil Rood|Tate Donovan|Stephen Mendillo|Phil Garran|Virginia Smith|Annie Nessen|Katharine Houghton|Marcie Vaughan|Burt Porter|Rusty De Wees|Paul Donlon|Joan Allen|Robert Nutt|David Dellinger|W. keywords: horse drawn carriage|character name as title|two word title|ethan frome character|period drama
title: Ethan Frome
